text: Bastutah yadi pratyeka gonahagarera kache eta parimana thake ya ache samagra yaminera majhe, ara abasya'i yadi segulo nijera muktira binimaye dite ca'ibe ara gopane gopane anutapa karabe, yakhana ayaba dekhabe. Bastutah tadera jan'ya sid'dhanta habe n'yayasangata ebam tadera upara julama habe na.
